name: Frontline Ops
description:
Frontline Ops is a top down shooter. It puts emphasis on combat tactics in combination with a slightly arcade style. The player's goal is to neutralize the enemy team.

This game will feature:

  • Weapon customisations (different foregrips, lasers, gun-stocks etc.)
  • Weapons and environments are based on realistic elements
  • Different maps (Middle-East, Eastern Europe etc.)

NOTE: At the moment, I put emphasis on tactical gameplay, so objectives that player would capture (Battlefield-like style) will be added in the future. After the player dies, he will respawn.
